Package bacnet.datamodel.annotation

Class CodonUsage

java.lang.Object
bacnet.datamodel.annotation.CodonUsage
public class CodonUsage extends Object
Tools for calculating codon Usage of amino acid sequences
Codon Usage tables came from : http://www.kazusa.or.jp/codon/
Author:
UIBC

    CodonUsage(String codonTableName)

    static void
    verifyCodonUsage()
    To verify the codon prediction on EGD-e genome we look at all the genome and count the number of AAA, ATG and CCC codons
